needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text: The secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza are the reason why Lisp, the programming language used by Viaweb, was so powerful; it has no syntax, allowing programs to manipulate the parse trees that get generated by the compiler, making it a truly unique language.
